question: Which state has the best Anaemia Mukt Bharat (AMB) Index among 29 states in the country?
explanation:
In a recently released scorecard of the Anaemia Mukt Bharat (AMB) Index by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare, Haryana was ranked at the top spot with an AMB Index of 46.7.
The Anaemia Mukt Bharat is an initiative of the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare and UNICEF. It aims to reduce the prevalence of Anaemia all over India.
